Constructor & Destructor Documentation

btk::DTFPSignalExtractor::DTFPSignalExtractor ( const std::string &  vectorsFileName,
const std::string &  dataFileName,
const std::string &  maskFileName,
char  displayMode 
)

Constructor Extract signal from the data file using directions files. The signal is normalized (division by the average reference image).

Parameters:
vectorsFileName Name of the file containing vectors
dataFileName Signal filename
maskFileName Image mask filename
